pathAssistantSteps.info:
• ‘Active' indicates that the project is being actively managed. The project becomes ‘Active’ from the date specified in the ‘Start Date’ field.
  • Use the ‘Activity’ panel to create and track the tasks related to managing this project.
• ‘Completed’ indicates that the project has reached its end date. The project is ‘Completed’ on the date specified in the ‘End Date’ field.

• ‘Decommissioned’ indicates that the project has been discontinued. Update the ‘Decommissioned Date’ field to trigger the ‘Decommissioned’ state and update the ‘Decommissioned Reason’ field to capture the reasons for decommissioning.

• ‘New' indicates that a new project has been created from an opportunity.
  • Complete the ‘Project Summary’ section by updating the ‘Project Summary’ and ‘End Date’ fields.
  • Use the ‘Activity’ panel to create and track the tasks related to managing this project.
